meanings.definition: To say or write something as a comment or observation.
meanings.sent1: She remarked on the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: He always remarks on the weather when he visits.
meanings.sent3: The cat remarked on the empty food bowl with a meow.
meanings.sent4: The teacher remarked on the student's exceptional progress in math.
meanings.sent5: The detective remarked on the suspicious behavior of the suspect.

meanings.definition: A written or spoken comment or observation.
meanings.sent1: His remark about the movie was insightful.
meanings.sent2: She made a remark about the new company policy.
meanings.sent3: The remark about the noisy neighbors made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The remark about the sunset being like a painting was poetic.
meanings.sent5: The remark about the delicious cake made everyone hungry.
